rdf:Description.dc:title: Natural history of the Andrew Lake region, northeastern Alberta 1990
rdf:Description.dc:creator: McGillivray, W. Bruce (William Bruce), 1954-
Hastings, Ross, 1956-
Provincial Museum of Alberta. Natural History Section.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Provincial Museum of Alberta,
rdf:Description.dc:description: This survey of the Andrew Lake area of northeast Alberta includes data on fauna, flora, and other aspects of this area of granite outcrops. Data were collected by the Provincial Museum of Alberta Natural History Section.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Natural history
Zoology
Botany
